grape.ensmallen.preprocessing package

Submodules

grape.ensmallen.preprocessing.cooccurence_matrix module

Return triple with CSR representation of cooccurrence matrix.

The first vector has the sources, the second vector the destinations and the third one contains the min-max normalized frequencies.

param sequences

the sequence of sequences of integers to preprocess.

type sequences

List[List[int]],

param window_size

Window size to consider for the sequences.

type window_size

int = 4,

param verbose

whether to show the progress bars. The default behaviour is false.

type verbose

bool = False,

grape.ensmallen.preprocessing.okapi_bm25_tfidf_int module

Return vocabulary and TFIDF matrix of given documents.

param documents

The documents to parse

type documents

List[List[String]],

param k1

The default parameter for k1, tipically between 1.2 and 2.0.

type k1

Optional[float],

param b

The default parameter for b, tipically equal to 0.75.

type b

Optional[float],

param vocabulary_size

The expected vocabulary size.

type vocabulary_size

Optional[usize],

param verbose

Whether to show a loading bar.

type verbose

Optional[bool],

grape.ensmallen.preprocessing.word2vec module

Return training batches for Word2Vec models.

The batch is composed of a tuple as the following:

  • (Contexts indices, central nodes indices): the tuple of nodes

This does not provide any output value as the model uses NCE loss and basically the central nodes that are fed as inputs work as the outputs value.

param sequences

the sequence of sequences of integers to preprocess.

type sequences

List[List[int]],

param window_size

Window size to consider for the sequences.

type window_size

int,

Module contents

grape.ensmallen.preprocessing.cooccurence_matrix(sequences, *, window_size, verbose)

Return triple with CSR representation of cooccurrence matrix.

The first vector has the sources, the second vector the destinations and the third one contains the min-max normalized frequencies.

Parameters

  • sequences (List[List[int]],) – the sequence of sequences of integers to preprocess.

  • window_size (int = 4,) – Window size to consider for the sequences.

  • verbose (bool = False,) – whether to show the progress bars. The default behaviour is false.

grape.ensmallen.preprocessing.okapi_bm25_tfidf_int(documents, k1, b, vocabulary_size, verbose)

Return vocabulary and TFIDF matrix of given documents.

Parameters

  • documents (List[List[String]],) – The documents to parse

  • k1 (Optional[float],) – The default parameter for k1, tipically between 1.2 and 2.0.

  • b (Optional[float],) – The default parameter for b, tipically equal to 0.75.

  • vocabulary_size (Optional[usize],) – The expected vocabulary size.

  • verbose (Optional[bool],) – Whether to show a loading bar.

grape.ensmallen.preprocessing.okapi_bm25_tfidf_str(documents, k1, b, vocabulary_size, verbose)

Return vocabulary and TFIDF matrix of given documents.

Parameters

  • documents (List[List[String]],) – The documents to parse

  • k1 (Optional[float],) – The default parameter for k1, tipically between 1.2 and 2.0.

  • b (Optional[float],) – The default parameter for b, tipically equal to 0.75.

  • vocabulary_size (Optional[usize],) – The expected vocabulary size.

  • verbose (Optional[bool],) – Whether to show a loading bar.

grape.ensmallen.preprocessing.word2vec(sequences, window_size)

Return training batches for Word2Vec models.

The batch is composed of a tuple as the following:

  • (Contexts indices, central nodes indices): the tuple of nodes

This does not provide any output value as the model uses NCE loss and basically the central nodes that are fed as inputs work as the outputs value.

Parameters

  • sequences (List[List[int]],) – the sequence of sequences of integers to preprocess.

  • window_size (int,) – Window size to consider for the sequences.
